name: The Island (itch) (TheShaggyDev)
description:
A short, Lovecraftian metroidvania. Created for Metroidvania Month 13.

Note: This game requires WebGL 2.0 and makes heavy use of lighting and particle effects, which can have lead to performance issues or other oddities on some machines. If the web build gives you trouble, try a downloadable build.

9-16-2021 update: Fixed a memory leak in the game. If you had problems with crashing before, try a fresh download :)
